name: Flower Hoodies
description: The first full production item by Lusiant. This came in 3 colorways, brown, blue, and white.

name: Beige Solitude Hoodie
description: The first streamline produced Lusiant hoodie, comes in Beige, but is also sold in Green

name: Green Solitude Hoodie
description: The first streamline produced Lusiant hoodie, comes in Green, but is also available in Beige.

name: Black City Crewneck
description: Lusiants only hoodie so exclusive it never made it into Lusiant's production. This is the Black 'city' Crewneck.
